data.scheme_name: Maharashtra Logistics Policy, 2024 - Independent Logistics Units - Interest Subsidy - All MSMEs - Existing
data.benefits: The scheme provides interest subsidies of 3% for logistics units inside approved parks and 2% for those outside, enhancing financial support for MSME investments in core logistics activities.
data.eligibility: The units engaged in core logistics activities, including warehousing and cargo handling.
data.conditions: Investments up to Rs. 5000 lakhs (excluding land costs). Minimum built-up area of 20,000 Sq.Ft. required for units outside approved parks.
data.beneficiaries: The units engaged in core logistics activities, including warehousing and cargo handling.
data.prerequisites:
Investments up to Rs. 5000 lakhs (excluding land costs). 

Minimum built-up area of 20,000 Sq.Ft. required for units outside approved parks.
data.nodal_agency: Maharashtra Industry, Trade and Investment Facilitation Cell (MAITRI)
data.context: The policy introduced to establish Maharashtra as a World-class logistics hub and a leading center for trade and transportation by focusing on creating an efficient Integrated logistics infrastructure, improve the competitiveness of the local logistics industry.
data.objective: The policy aims to reduce costs in logistics through a comprehensive logistics master plan keeping a developmental view of next 10 years.
data.description:
Interest Subsidy 

Benefits For Units Inside Approved Parks: 

Subsidy Rate: 3% interest subsidy. 

Maximum Cap: ₹75 lakh per annum for up to 5 years. 

Eligibility: First 100 entities during the policy period. 

For Units Outside the Park: 

Subsidy Rate: 2% interest subsidy. 

Maximum Cap: ₹50 lakh per annum for up to 5 years. 

Eligibility: Minimum built-up area of 20,000 sq. ft., first 100 entities during the policy period.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through this link : https://testmaitri2.mahaitgov.in/auth/registrationtypes
data.funding_facilitator: Maharashtra Industry, Trade and Investment Facilitation Cell (MAITRI)
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the incentives subject to the approval of the concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
Application Form
Udyam registration certificate |(For MSME)
Business Plan (logistics operations)
Land Documents
Environmental Clearance
Financial Statements
Project Report
Incentive Application
Compliance Certificates
Technology adoption plan
data.checklist_info_b: Maharashtra Industry, Trade and Investment Facilitation Cell (mahaitgov.in)
data.checklist_info_d:

data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
